name: Pixel Arena
description:
A short VR game made in Godot for Miz Jam 1. Total development time was less than 30 hours (timetracking got a bit overlooked towards the end). Fight back the waves of enemies coming for you and make it to the end!

Controls:

Trigger: Teleport (empty hand) / Fire crossbow

Grip: Pick up and release weapons

Joystick: Move (left) / Snap turn (right)

NOTE: THIS HAS ONLY BEEN TESTED ON A WMR DEVICE. IT IS VERY LIKELY IT WILL NOT CURRENTLY WORK ON OTHER HEADSETS.

Example gameplay video coming soon for those without VR
